# 🦄 景蓝的小屋

![Node.js >= 20](https://img.shields.io/badge/node.js-%3E%3D20-brightgreen)
![pnpm >= 9](https://img.shields.io/badge/pnpm-%3E%3D9-blue)
[![DeepWiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/DeepWiki-saicaca%2Ffuwari-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://deepwiki.com/saicaca/fuwari)
[![FOSSA Status](https://app.fossa.com/api/projects/git%2Bgithub.com%2Fsaicaca%2Ffuwari.svg?type=shield&issueType=license)](https://app.fossa.com/projects/git%2Bgithub.com%2Fsaicaca%2Ffuwari?ref=badge_shield&issueType=license)

一个基于 [Astro](https://astro.build) 和 [Fuwari](https://github.com/saicaca/fuwari) 的静态博客.

[**🖥️ 前往站点**](https://fuwari.yurik.cafe)

![Preview Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/saicaca/resource/main/fuwari/home.png)
